reviewText: I read about it in a catalog and I had to order it to watch sounded like a great movie so will let you know how it turns out . Sounds sad and great at the same time.
Title: Elizabeth's Gift

reviewText: I hate it when movie plots enhance the suspense through stupidity. This movie was guilty of that. The fact that it features a new age concept of a child coming back to Earth was a big turn off as well. The movie just seemed out of sync to me most of the way through. It has some moments of suspense but they felt awkward. Fake violence is really hard to make convincing. This movie failed at it. I loved the crazy guy who thought the mother was an angel sent from General Patton. And I loved her performance. But all in all, this was just an average movie for me.
Title: Elizabeth's Gift

reviewText: This is a fine film with great values and excellent messages.  Very interesting and well done.  Thank you for the recommendation.
Title: Elizabeth's Gift

reviewText: I bought this movie because I really loved Kari Hawker in Christmas Angel. Kari seems to have the ability to act without effort and in my opinion was perfect for the role. Elizabeth's Gift is a very touching movie about a couple that lost their child due to a heart condition they were unaware their daughter had. The story tells the story of the parents plight to regain their happiness through love and a miracle, Elizabeth's Gift to them. I would recommend to anyone that loves movies that touch their hearts and has a real meaning in life. Since I loved Kari's performance in Christmas Angle and the price was right for this movie, I had no choice but to buy it. Glad I did.
Title: Elizabeth's Gift

reviewText: The children were wonderful but the movie was not realistic.  The author needs to check laws to keep a movie factual.
Title: Elizabeth's Gift

reviewText: This DVD was great.  I enjoyed watching every minute of it.  It makes you wonder whether there really is life after death.
Title: Elizabeth's Gift

reviewText: Excellent movie.  A little girl dies from unknown heart condition.  Father, policeman, suggests mother do some volunteer work to help herself mentally.  Her dead daughter's spirit with rose petal leads her to a little girl living on street who had witnessed her mother being shot to death. This little girl is adopted by them. Film deals with crime, kidnapping of child, etc so there is plenty of story.  It is a movie that can be watched by entire family. It would help to have Kleenex nearby as it is very emotional.
Title: Elizabeth's Gift
